definition: bottomless pit of desire (idiom); insatiable greed/carnal cravings are never satisfied and are a main obstruction on the path to enlightenment
to wish for/to desire/variant of 慾|欲[yu4]
to fill or stuff/(of a form etc) to fill in

sentences.english: The first mistake marketers make is that they want more.
sentences.chinese: 营销人员所犯的第一个错误就是他们的欲壑难填。

sentences.english: They have voracious appetites for facts and figures of any kind.
sentences.chinese: 他们对任何类型的数据和事实的胃口都是欲壑难填。

definition: avaricious and insatiable (idiom); greedy and never satisfied
a man who is never content is like a snake trying to swallow an elephant (idiom)
pinyin: ren2 xin1 bu4 zu2 she2 tun1 xiang4

definition: avaricious and insatiable (idiom); greedy and never satisfied
lit. covet Sichuan once Gansu has been seized/fig. endless greed/insatiable desire
avaricious and insatiable (idiom); greedy and never satisfied
to lose one's head through material greed (idiom)
(of greed, lust etc) to dominate one's thoughts
